channel.title: Wandb on The Probability Engine
channel.description: Recent content in Wandb on The Probability Engine

item.title: Anatomy of an MLOps Pipeline - Part 1: Pipeline and Orchestration
item.description: Part 1: Philosophy, project architecture and orchestration with Hydra + MLflow. Steps for preprocessing, feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning and model registry.

item.title: Anatomy of an MLOps Pipeline - Part 2: Deployment and Infrastructure
item.description: Part 2: CI/CD with GitHub Actions, W&B vs MLflow comparison, complete containerization with Docker, and production-ready API architecture with FastAPI.
